program.description: A powerful devkit for scaffolding new projects.

command.description: Create a new project from a template

language.argument: The programming language of the template (e.g., 'react', 'node')

name.argument: The name of your new project

option.description: The name of the template to use (e.g., 'ts', 'simple-api')

command.description: List all available templates in the configuration.

language.argument: The language to filter templates by

templates.not_found: No templates found in the configuration file.

version.description: Output the current version of the CLI.

run.fail: ‚ùå Failed to run official CLI command.

command.description:
Set a configuration value. 

Available keys:
  pm, packageManager      - Sets the default package manager to use for new projects.
                          Possible values: {pmValues}
  cache, cacheStrategy    - Sets the global caching behavior for remote templates.
                          Possible values: 'always-refresh', 'never-refresh', 'daily'
  language, lg            - Sets the language of the CLI. Possible values: 'en', 'fr'

value.argument: The new value for the key

option.global: Update the global configuration instead of the local one.

command.description: Initializes a global configuration file with default settings.

option.local: Initialize a local configuration file instead of a global one.

command.description: Update the cache strategy for a specific template.
command.fail: ‚ùå Failed to update cache strategy for template '{template}'.
command.success: ‚ú® Cache strategy for template '{template}' updated to '{strategy}'.

template.argument: The name of the template to update

cache.success: Cache strategy for template '{template}' updated to '{strategy}'
cache.fail: Failed to update cache strategy for template '{template}'

check.local: Checking for local or monorepo configuration...
check.global: Local config not found. Checking for global configuration...

found.local: Found and using local configuration at {path}.
found.global: No local config found. Using global configuration at {path}.

found.default: No configuration file found. Using default settings.

invalid.value: Invalid value for {key}. Valid options are: {options}

config.parse: Failed to parse {file}. Using default configuration.
config.exists: File already exists at {path}. Use 'config set' to update it.
config.no_file_found: No configuration file found. Run 'devkit config init' to create a global one, or 'devkit config init --local' to create a local one.

root.not_found: Could not find project root containing package.json.

scaffolding.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred during scaffolding.

language.not_found: Scaffolding language not found in configuration: '{language}'

cache.fail: Failed to update cache strategy for template '{template}'

config.not_found: Failed to save local configuration. File not found at '{path}'.

error.language_config_not_found: Scaffolding language not found in configuration: '{language}'

copy.start: üìÇ Copying cached template to project directory...
copy.fail: ‚ùå Failed to copy files from cache.

local.config: No local project configuration found. Using global or default settings.

not.initialized: Global configuration not initialized. Run 'devkit config init' to create one.

warning.no_config_found: ‚ö†Ô∏è No configuration file found. Using default settings.

add_template.description: Add a new template to the configuration

options.description: A brief description of the template
options.alias: A short alias for the template
options.cache: The cache strategy for the template
options.package_manager: The package manager to use for the template
